Name: Synonym
About the game: Synonym is an atmospheric puzzle game with mechanics inspired by mimicry. Manipulate blocks that will copy your position, height and rotation. Levels are designed to offer unique solutions and avoid redundancy. Therefore, the 16 unique levels will quickly escalate in difficulty to requiring very delicate solutions. Synonym is the right game for you if you enjoy Sokoban-style puzzle games with interesting twists.
